The image was published on January 30: 2020, and has been shared more than 44,000 times on Facebook.
The image features the back label of a b: a disinfectant brand, dated October 27, 2019, claiming to kill various viruses including "Human Coronavirus."
The post: s caption questions how the makers of Dettol knew about the coronavirus in 2019.
Reckitt Benkiser: the company behind Dettol, refuted the claim, stating that they had not yet tested their products on the novel coronavirus and could not confirm its effectiveness.
